page.title: 17My hobbies - various
page.content: {FISHING}: My hobby is fishing, you need a fishing rod, some bait a fishing line and some hooks. You put the line on the rod and the hook on the end of the line. The bait goes on the hook and can be maggots, worms or bread. I like my hobby because you can see what is in the lake. {COLLECTING OLD COINS AND BOTTLES }: My hobby is collecting old objects, like old bottles and old coins. My oldest coin was made in 1961 and my oldest bottle is about 100 years old. All you need is a spade, a strong wooden box and, if possible, a metal detector. {BADMINTON}: My hobby is Badminton, to play it you need a raquet, a net and a shuttlecock. You must not let the shuttlecock hit the ground or go out of court and it must go over the net.
